You realize that things seem to be getting bigger. Finally, you realize that it's actually you getting smaller! Panicked, you rush back to the locker room to try and find someone to help. You'd already missed the bus, so you decided to drive yourself into school and take a shower in the locker room, bringing your change of clothes and gym bag. Luckily, you didn't have to go to 50 bus stops so got to school very early. You went around the quietest way you could to the locker room, avoiding the very few people at school that early, so you didn't have to torture anyone with your body odor, though that would be kind of funny. Charlie plants his foot on the ground and begins to reach for you. You stumble backwards, but his thick hand closes around you. He elevates you and holds you in front of his face. You look around and get an extremely close view of the titanic teen's sweaty chest, his veiny biceps, the six-pack abs, each one taller than you. But his face is insane. His deep blue eyes stare at you, taking in the wonder of having a tiny person in his hands. You can see where he missed a couple spots shaving, the small patches of stubble marring the rest of his youthful face. His lips are large, and pink, with thousands of tiny creases and cracks in the surface. If they opened wide, he could swallow you whole. The enormity of the face is overwhelming, it's too hard not too look at all the details in amazing clarity, but you take a step back, and look at the face as a whole, trying to judge the expression of the person who, quite literally, holds your life in his hands. Jimmy enters the locker room in his uniform, his baseball bag in hand. He puts it in his locker and you realize he's about to leave, so you race after him shouting "Jimmy! Jimmy!"

Jimmy stops and turns around, spotting you. You don't even have a chance to ask for help before he scoops you up and flashes his handsome grin at you.

"It happened again?" he asks. You don't know what he's talking about. "Every so often a boy shrinks in here," he elaborates. "I found a few before. And now it's you, Jason!"

info.description:
You, Jason, are a high school junior who goes to an all-boys school. You shrink one day and find yourself at the mercy of your schoolmates...

THE BOYS:
Football Players-
-Andrew, 17, somewhat short with dark hair, dark eyes, and a tanned complexion. He's pretty smart.

-Connor, 18, tall and well-built, Connor is a football captain with brown hair and blue eyes. He is well-liked by everyone.
-Peter, 17, olive-skinned with dark hair, dark eyes, and a chiseled jaw, Peter is short but very athletic with a fun, easygoing personality.
-Sal, 17, Sal is light skinned with light brown eyes and dark hair. He's of average height with a decent build.
-Vinny, 18, goofy, well-liked football captain Vinny is handsome, well-built, and has bluish eyes and light brown hair.

Basketball Players-
-Colin, 16, is pretty tall and slim, with blue eyes, light-brown hair, and round cheeks.
-James, 17, is a well-liked, smart basketballer. Although kind of short for a basketball player, he's very skilled and has dark hair and eyes.
-Sam, 15, is tall and lean, with dark hair, dark eyes, and tanned skin tone. He has a good sense of humor.

-Rob, 17, short, athletic, and tan due to his Latino heritage, Rob has pointy, white teeth and a lean but well-built physique.
